MonsterTrait.Name: Asgardian Battleaxes
MonsterTrait.Text: Made in Valhalla and kept keen with runic magic, Asgardian axes have a +2 enchantment and add a second die of weapon damage. Their magic must be renewed each week by a valkyrie or Odin's own hand.

MonsterTrait.Name: Battle Loving
MonsterTrait.Text: Einherjars relish combat and never turn down a challenge to single combat or shirk a fight, even if the odds are hopeless. After all, Valhalla awaits them.

MonsterTrait.Name: Battle Frenzy
MonsterTrait.Text: Once reduced to 30 hp or less, einherjar make all attacks with advantage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Fearsome Gaze
MonsterTrait.Text: The stare of an einherjar is especially piercing and intimidating. They make Intimidation checks with advantage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The einherjar's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: An einherjar makes three attacks with its Asgardian battleaxe or one with its handaxe.

MonsterAction.Name: Asgardian Battleaxe
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage when used one handed or 17 (2d10 + 6) when used two-handed.

MonsterAction.Name: Handaxe
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
